CustomField.description: We want to identify a client who has participated to the buy-back program by reselling his old RIMOWA suitcase. To do this we wish to create a new field at Client level to be exported to SFDC.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ‘’Recrafted Firstimer’’ à A client who resells 1 or several RIMOWA suitcases for the first time ‘’Recrafted Adopter’’ à A client who has resold several RIMOWA suitcases on different dates.
CustomField.label: Re Crafted Seller
